mapper.select: SELECT s.total_score - NVL(u.total_use_score, 0) AS score_usable FROM (SELECT user_no, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM score WHERE user_no = (SELECT user_no FROM users WHERE use_id = #{useId}) GROUP BY user_no) s LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_no, SUM(use_score) AS total_use_score FROM use_score WHERE user_no = (SELECT user_no FROM users WHERE use_id = #{useId}) GROUP BY user_no) u ON s.user_no = u.user_no
